basics.name: Siddharth Gelera
basics.label: Principal Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer • Minimalist • OSS Fanatic

highlights: Achieve 8ms response times for a hard constraint based search system based on Redis
Optimize CI and Dev tooling to increase the development feedback cycle by 30%
Contributed to fastify, mercurius and other OSS projects
Led and built ComplyIQ and it's tax management platform for the American Clientele to increase tax filing accuracy
Built the impoweredTeam (https://www.impoweredteam.com) iOS and Android app and it's architecture to help caretakers and caregivers find each other
Built Parkpoolr(http://parkpoolr.com) from MVP to acquisition, a product for customers to book parking spaces with per-minute accuracy and for hosts to be able to manage and flexibly change the fare
Provided technical guidance and simplified deployments for multiple small-scale apps and startups
Helped setup various quality of life improvements to the LoopBack.io codebase
Optimized elastic search queries and instances to make sure analytical reports were accurate and fast, sub 10s report generation for decks
POC and SDK setup for the NativeScript app that was built as a companion to the large web based portal
Worked on creating a simplified flow for both customer and garage owners to manage their bookings for car repairs. The stack was the good ol' MEAN Stack
Helped create the initial damage detection of vehicles with Machine Learning (Tensorflow and Python)
Worked on realising a marketing analytics platform that curates data from other marketing platforms (Facebook/LinkedIn Ads, Instagram Ads, etc)
Parallely worked on Taxation and Medical Delivery Operations domains
Learned backend developement with loopback.io while working with React and Angular.js for the above mentioned platforms
Found my first set of mentors
Worked with the core team to bring to life an MVP of the Admin portal for managing driver bookings and location to simplify customer to driver contact

highlights: Used by Air Live Reload (16k Stars) - https://github.com/air-verse/air

highlights: Got it working for iOS and Android for most of the DOM operations
